### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)

### Iron plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)

### Unused furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when researching technologies
- Ensure you have the required ingredients to research a technology before attempting to research it.
### Errors when crafting items
- Make sure the recipe for the item is unlocked before attempting to craft it.
- Ensure you have the required ingredients to craft an item before attempting to craft it.
### Errors when setting research
- Ensure the research is valid and can be set before attempting to set it.
